pos_mean_info_list.mean: [数] 余数，残余；剩余物；其余的人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，多指人在某地暂时逗留。有时可指较长时间的居留。
指某人或某物仍留在原处或保持原来的状态。
着重因愉快的事而使人不愿离开。

word_group.brief_definition: 保持镇定；保持冷静；冷静
保持恒定；保持不变；保持连贯
保持沉默；继续保持沉默

bilingual.source: We can stay in touch with the people that we want to remain friends with.
bilingual.target: 我们可以和我们想要保持朋友关系的人保持联系。

bilingual.source: Nowadays, we can move around the world and still stay in touch with the people that we want to remain friends with.
bilingual.target: 如今，我们可以环游世界，并且仍然与我们想保持联系的人保持联系。
在上课期间，请保持安静。

bilingual.source: You have the right to remain silent.

bilingual.target: 他们对这个问题保持远离。

bilingual.source: He waived his right to remain silent.
bilingual.target: 他放弃了保持沉默的权利。
这位捐赠者希望保持匿名。

bilingual.source: We need to remain stable in our income.
bilingual.target: 我们需要保持稳定的收入。

list.abstract: remain（英 [rɪˈmeɪn]，美 [rɪˈmeɪn]），英语单词，作动词为保持；留下；遗留。短语搭配有remain in good condition（保持良好的状态）。例句为“Its sustainable exploitation will remain difficult.（它的可持续开发仍然很困难。）” remain相关近义词有stop、keep up等，相关反义词有change。

yingyinNormal.en: Remain calm and give them nothing but a united front as we fight this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 保持冷静，什么都不要做，只要团结起来一致对外。

yingyinNormal.en: But most of all, these patriots knew to remain loyal to each other because their survival depended on it in a dangerous, new land.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但最重要的是，这些爱国者们保持对彼此的忠诚，因为他们能在那片危险的新大陆上幸存下来都是源于此。

yingyinNormal.en: No, seriously. You sound like a family member who googled electrocution and is trying to remain optimistic. Well, I am optimistic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说真的 你听起来像是一个刚刚谷歌过电刑致死的患者家属，之后还努力保持乐观。我的确是乐观主义者。

yingyinNormal.en: He wants to remain on the court?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他还想待在法庭上吗？

yingyinNormal.en: The world below must remain your home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 地下的世界仍然是你们的归宿。

yingyinNormal.en: Where the fear is gone, only I will remain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当恐惧消逝，惟我依然屹立。

yingyinNormal.en: Cathy? The Russians remain intransigent on the Jordan Valley.
yingyinNormal.zh: 俄罗斯在约旦河谷问题上仍不肯妥协。

yingyinNormal.en: This is a secret few men knew. And fewer still remain alive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是个鲜为人知的秘密，知情人也死得差不多了。

yingyinNormal.en: Until then, the crab shall remain frozen where he now stands.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在那之前，螃蟹要被冻起来。

yingyinNormal.en: What I'm about to tell you has to remain between us. Of course.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来我说的，一定要保密。没问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Ahkmenrah's place is here with his family. He must remain here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿卡曼拉应该待在这，和他的家人团聚。他必须留下。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: Will it grow? No, Suzy. It will remain in the ground for many years. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那它会长大吗？不会的，苏西。它会一直封存在地下，封存很多很多年。

yingyinNormal.en: And yet you can be in two places at once. I urge you to remain in Starfleet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过，你可以一人分饰两角了。我支持你继续留在星际舰队。

yingyinNormal.en: Circle must remain small. What of Jingim? I do not wish to burden him as of yet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不能让太多人知道。那真金呢？我不想让他承受如此压力。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. But don't worry, I will remain the same down-to-earth humble Joe I've always been.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过别担心，就像现在这样，我将依然是你们接地气的小伙伴。

yingyinNormal.en: I chose to remain in my office to oversee the capture or killing of one Ahmed Al Ahmadi.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我选择留在我的办公室监督对艾哈迈德·艾哈迈德的逮捕或击杀。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I assure you that our conversation will remain confidential. Thank you for your time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不会，我保证我们的谈话不会外泄，谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: But I remain confident. We've got the best equipment and the best minds all working on it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我还是很有信心。我们有最好的仪器与最顶尖的科研人员都在努力着呢。

yingyinNormal.en: I am to remain in my post here. Good. Mrs Crawley is to stay on as our almoner. Very sensible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会继续留在这里。很好。卡劳利夫人会继续担任司务。很明智。

yingyinNormal.en: I've had second thoughts about your resignation. Would you like to remain as attorney general?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我重新考虑了一下你的辞职，你还想继续当司法部长吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: One oft-debated cure for this labor shortage <highlight>remains</highlight> as implausible as it's been all along: NativeU.S.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一直以来，人们争论不休的解决劳动力短缺问题的方法都是难以置信的：美国本土劳动力。

examination_example.sentence: Its sustainable exploitation will <highlight>remain</highlight> difficult.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的可持续开发仍然很困难。

examination_example.sentence: Nonetheless, unification of sorts <highlight>remains</highlight> a major goal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管如此，各种形式的统一仍然是一个主要目标。

examination_example.sentence: We know we are moving into a period where the jobs in demand will change rapidly, as will the requirements of the jobs that <highlight>remain</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要知道，我们正在进入这样一个时期，需求中的工作将会迅速发生变化。

examination_example.sentence: But some of it <highlight>remains</highlight> in the brain, where it influences mood, behavior and physiology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但其中一些仍留在大脑中，影响情绪、行为和生理。

examination_example.sentence: But just some 22, 000 birds <highlight>remain</highlight> today, occupying about 16% of the species' historic range.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前仅存约22000只鸟类，约占该物种历史范围的16%。

examination_example.sentence: Archaeologists also may locate buried <highlight>remains</highlight> by using such technologies as ground radar, magnetic-field recording, and metal detectors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考古学家还可以利用地面雷达、磁场记录和金属探测器等技术来定位埋在地下的遗骸。

word_usage.usage: remain通常不用于进行时，作系动词时， 表示"（继续）保存"、"依然"、"仍然处于（某种状态）"，后可接形容词、V-ing、过去分词、不定式的被动式、介词短语、名词，如remain silent保持沉默、remain singing一直在唱歌、remain at home留在家里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>remain</highlight> calm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们保持冷静。

examination_example.sentence: Despite the huge investment into research, ageing <highlight>remains</highlight> somewhat obscure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管对研究进行了大量投资，“衰老”这一概念仍然有些模糊。

examination_example.sentence: After the blaze was declared completely extinguished, 15 hours after it started, the junior interior minister said the structure had been saved but <highlight>remained</highlight> vulnerable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大火持续了15小时后被完全扑灭，初级内政部长表示该建筑得以幸存，但仍然岌岌可危。

examination_example.sentence: The Paris fire brigade risked their lives to <highlight>remain</highlight> inside the burning monument.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴黎消防队队员冒着生命危险留在起火的建筑内。

word_usage.usage:
remain表“保持”时，后常接形容词、名词、分词等作表语。
他们从不满足于自己的成绩。
误 They never remained satisfiedly with their success.
正 They never remained satisfied with their success.

remain表“逗留，停留”时，主要作不及物动词，常与 away, behind, in, of, on, out, up等介/副词连用，表示各种附加意义。
示例：她走了，而我留了下来。 
误 She left, but I remained. 
正 She left, but I remained behind.

remain因本身含有“持续”的意思，故不跟continue连用，也不能与still连用。
他仍然是这个学校的校长。
误 He continued to remains the principal of the school.
正 He remains the principal of the school.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 保持；留下；遗留；留在；保持不变；一直是；剩余；逗留；余留

examination_example.sentence: "And that expert advice <highlight>remains</highlight> pretty simple," says Nestle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “专家的建议仍然非常简单，”雀巢公司说。

examination_example.sentence: The justifications change; the desire for more trees <highlight>remains</highlight> constant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 理由改变了;而人们对更多树木的渴望却一直没有改变。

examination_example.sentence: But whether it's an English-cooked breakfast or a coffee and a sandwich, one thing has <highlight>remained</highlight> the same: the prices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但无论是英式早餐还是咖啡配三明治，有一点是不会变的：价格。

examination_example.sentence: Once he's all done, the work will <highlight>remain</highlight> there permanently.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦他完成了所有的工作，作品将永远留在那里。

examination_example.sentence: Anumeric people have some trouble keeping track of how many nuts <highlight>remain</highlight> in the can.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多人在记录罐头里还剩下多少坚果时都有困难。

examination_example.sentence: Twelve regions were listed as unsafe on Wednesday; on Thursday, eight <highlight>remained</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 周三，12个地区被列为不安全地区; 周四，仍有八个。

word_usage.usage:
remain表“保持”时，后常接形容词、名词、分词等作表语。
他们从不满足于自己的成绩。
误 They never remained satisfiedly with their success.
正 They never remained satisfied with their success.

remain表“逗留，停留”时，主要作不及物动词，常与 away, behind, in, of, on, out, up等介/副词连用，表示各种附加意义。
示例：她走了，而我留了下来。 
误 She left, but I remained. 
正 She left, but I remained behind.

remain因本身含有“持续”的意思，故不跟continue连用，也不能与still连用。
他仍然是这个学校的校长。
误 He continued to remains the principal of the school.
正 He remains the principal of the school.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: What will <highlight>remain</highlight> of us when artificial intelligence takes over will be our creativity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当人工智能接管世界时，我们剩下的将是我们的创造力。

examination_example.sentence: I practised singing in the bedroom every day to <highlight>remain</highlight> at my best and be competitive for roles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我每天都在卧室练习唱歌，以保持最佳状态，争夺角色。

examination_example.sentence: The report data shows that pleasure reading levels for younger children, ages 2-8, <highlight>remain</highlight> largely the same.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 报告数据显示，2到8岁以下儿童的快乐阅读水平基本保持不变。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 保持；留下；遗留；留在；保持不变；一直是；剩余；逗留；余留

examination_example.sentence: That way, the park workers can make sure the land and animals <highlight>remain</highlight> safe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样，公园工作人员可以确保土地和动物的安全。

examination_example.sentence: Doing sports daily will make people <highlight>remain</highlight> in good condition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天做运动会让人保持良好的状态。

examination_example.sentence: Tom was surprised at his act, but he <highlight>remained</highlight> silent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 汤姆对他的行为感到惊讶，但他保持沉默。

examination_example.sentence: One thing happened long time ago, but it has <highlight>remained</highlight> in my mind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很久以前发生了一件事，但它一直留在我的脑海里。

examination_example.sentence: The young magpie <highlight>remained</highlight> on the top of the tree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小喜鹊停留在树顶上。

examination_example.sentence: It can <highlight>remain</highlight> in the environment for many years and pollute large areas of land and water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以在环境中存留多年并污染大面积的土地和水。

sense_info_list.zh: 剩余; 余留; 遗留

examination_example.sentence: It can show how much food restaurants <highlight>remain</highlight> each day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以显示餐馆每天还剩多少食物。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 事情, 真实的, 事物

word_usage.usage:
remain表“保持”时，后常接形容词、名词、分词等作表语。
他们从不满足于自己的成绩。
正 They never remained satisfied with their success.

remain表“逗留，停留”时，主要作不及物动词，常与 away, behind, in, of, on, out, up等介/副词连用，表示各种附加意义。
示例：她走了，而我留了下来。 
误 She left, but I remained. 
正 She left, but I remained behind.

remain因本身含有“持续”的意思，故不跟continue连用，也不能与still连用。
他仍然是这个学校的校长。
误 He continued to remains the principal of the school.
正 He remains the principal of the school.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指某人或某物仍留在原处或保持原来的状态。
普通用词，多指人在某地暂时逗留。有时可指较长时间的居留。
